articles.title: Halle Berry and Glenn Close Will Star With Kim Kardashian in New TV Show - E! Online - E! NEWS
articles.description: Kim Kardashian will be joined by Halle Berry and Glenn Close on All's Fair, a new TV show co-created by American Horror Story's Ryan Murphy.
articles.content:
Kim Kardashian is keeping up with acting heavy-hitters.
The reality star has recruited Halle Berry and Glenn Close as her costars and co-executive producers in All's Fair, a new legal drama created … [+755 chars]

articles.title: American Mountaineer Found Mummified In Peru 22 Years After Vanishing - NDTV
articles.description: The preserved body of an American mountaineer -- who disappeared 22 years ago while scaling a snowy peak in Peru -- has been found after being exposed by climate change-induced ice melt, police said Monday.
articles.content:
Peruvian police said his remains were finally exposed by ice melt on the Cordillera Blanca range.
Lima, Peru: The preserved body of an American mountaineer -- who disappeared 22 years ago while scal… [+1145 chars]
